body.name: RERE CSW1 AMOLED Smart Watch (Answer/Make Call) for Women, Round Smartwatch for Andriod and iPhone, Fitness Tracker with 20 Sport Modes, Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen, Sleep Monitor, IP68 Waterproof, Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Bluetooth Call Smart Wacth】RERE CSW1 smart watch is available to answer/make calls and dial the phone number on the smartwatch dialer. This smartwatch has a built-in microphone and external speaker, you can make/receive calls and play music on it when your phone is in your package while you are working out or doing outdoor bicycling or hiking.

【Smart Watch without Phone】This smart watch is also could be activatived and used without phone. Just choose the "Stand Alone Mode", then you could still enjoy the fitness track and health monitor functions. Warm note: some functions will not work in this mode.

【1.43 inch Large & Vivid Screen】This round smartwatch has a 1.43-inch screen with AMOLED material, which makes the font larger, icons and pictures more vivid. The premium screen will give you a more superior and sophisticated look.

【Automatically Monitor Your Health】You can enable monitoring your health through the app, the automatic monitoring includes Heart Rate, SpO2, Stress, Sleep and Temperature , this health tracker watch will remind you of abnormal data.

【Fitness Tracker with 20 Sports】This smart fitness tracker watch will help you exercise scientifically and achieve fitness goals easily by accurately monitoring your daily exercise data such as steps, distance, calories, heart rate, etc.

【IP68 Waterproof & 7 Days Battery Life】This round smart watch is shipped with a magnetic charging USB cable, only use 2 hours to fully charge.IP68 waterproof, suitable for both Android( 6.0+) phones and iPhones (iOS 9.0+). We offer a 12-month warranty and 24h message reply. Any problem, please feel free to contact us.
【BUY WITH WARRENTY】ReRe MorningLight offers 12-month warranty and 24h message reply. Any problem, please feel free to contact us.

Could it be used without phone? YES. You could choose the "Stand Alone Mode", then the smart watch will work with no need to connect to your phone. Warm note: In the "Stand Alone Mode", some functions will not work. How to turn on the Temperature monitor? Pls go to the Wofit app, then choose "Device"---"Switch Setting", click the "Automatic Temperature Detection" to switch on Is the watch band replacable? YES. RERE CSW1 smart watch band connector width is 22mm, you could choose the band you like and replace it. Does skin tend to be allergic to this watch straps? NO. The strap is made with silica gel, which does not cause skin irritation for almost everyone. But we do suggest you to clean it once a day, just wash the watch with water and dry it with paper, it will hlep clean sweat and dirt to keep skin fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Readable and rose gold
reviews.reviewText: This smart watch has a big and readable dial. The rose gold on the dial and buckle gives it warmth. The pale pink band is almost a neutral color. It goes well with most outfits. The plastic band is casual and comfortable. It does not pinch your wrist. I wish there was another dressy band that came with it. You can easily check your vital statistics. You can simply make and receive calls. This is a wonderful safeguard. You have less to carry when you're out and about. This is a wearable and practical smart watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does most of what it claims
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't able to access all of the features but it's nice for a basic smart watch. It does answer calls and show messages. The strap is comfortable and the battery lasts a good while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Perfect Fitness Companion
reviews.reviewText: With its large and convenient 1.43-inch AMOLED screen, this watch offers a vibrant and immersive visual experience. Whether you're checking notifications, reading messages, or tracking your workouts, the crisp display ensures clarity and ease of use.One of the standout features of the RERE CSW1 is its heart rate and blood oxygen monitors. These monitoring functions provide valuable insights into your health and fitness levels, particularly during your morning exercise routines. With accurate real-time data at your fingertips, you can track your heart rate and oxygen levels, enabling you to optimize your workouts and ensure you're exercising within your target heart rate zone. It's a must-have for those seeking to maintain a healthy and active lifestyle.Whether you're into running, cycling, yoga, swimming, or just closely keeping an eye on your overall health condition, this smartwatch has got you covered. With IP68 waterproof certification, you can confidently wear it during your water-based workouts without worrying about damage. Additionally, the watch boasts a sleep and temperature monitor, allowing you to monitor your sleep patterns and keep track of your body's temperature changes.

reviews.reviewText: I would not waste your money. I Couldn't get it to do anything he's saying. Besides, the screen just said 0 Saturday. 01 and would not do anything else. No matter what I did what I pushed. It wouldn't turn off total waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice watch for the price
reviews.reviewText: This watch has a lot of features but also has it where you can use the phone without having the on Bluetooth. If you want to get the chip has all the features you want. It's fits nice and comfy. It's got a little wider band which gives it a different look which is nice. I like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really nice resolution and functions great
reviews.reviewText: ReReMorningLight’s “AMOLED Smart Watch (Answer/Make Call) for Women, With/Without Phone Mode, 1.43" Round Fitness Watch, Body Temperature Thermometer, Heart Rate, SpO2, Sleep Monitor, 7-10 Days Battery, Pink,” is my very first AMOLED smart watch, which offers bigger, color-rich display that comes with name brand, high end smartwatches. Immediately, I’m impressed at how clear and vivid the screen is on this smart watch compared to other OLED only smartwatches. Additionally, this watch can pretty much do anything that other smartwatches can do, apart from text, which is important to me. Other than that, this is a very beautiful looking light pink watch and I highly recommend it.
